headline: CSX (CSX) Valuation in Focus After Strategic Wins Bolster Growth and Market Position
summary: CSX (CSX) has caught the market’s attention with two strategic moves: first, the Platinum Select Site designation for its Westgate Super Site in Alabama; and second, the company secured new freight business from a major logistics player following an important service agreement. See our latest analysis for CSX. CSX’s new supply chain wins and fresh industrial site designations come at a time of steady but measured performance. After a solid start to 2025, the stock’s year-to-date share price...
